abstract: Microsoft’s long-anticipated drive into the consumer health care market will offer free personal health records that can be managed on the Web.
snippet: Microsoft’s long-anticipated drive into the consumer health care market will offer free personal health records that can be managed on the Web.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is starting its long-anticipated drive into the consumer health care market by offering free personal health records on the Web and pursuing a strategy that borrows from the company’s successful formula in personal computer software.

headline.main: Microsoft Offers System to Track Health Records
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Offers System To Track Health Records

abstract: Microsoft plans to spin off Bungie Studios, creator of the blockbuster “Halo” video game trilogy, but said Friday it would maintain close ties with the company and retain a minority stake in it.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft plans to spin off Bungie Studios, creator of the blockbuster “Halo” video game trilogy, but said Friday it would maintain close ties with the company and retain a minority stake in it.

headline.main: Microsoft to Spin Off ‘Halo’ Creator Bungie
